short_summary: delivery of a refrigerated trailer to Summerland, BC
description: Agriculture and Agri-Foods Canada has a requirement for a 6’x12’ refrigerated trailer must be equipped with minimum of 3500 lbs rated tandem axles.",
full_summary: **Notice of Request for Proposal** **Procurement Title** 01452-330998: Refrigerated Trailer for Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada **Reference Number** WS3826864201-Doc3826889001 **Procurement Type** Notice for Request for Proposal **Closing Date and Time** January 31, 2023 at 2:00 PM (Pacific Standard Time) **Description** Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada is seeking a refrigerated trailer with the following specifications: * Minimum 6'x12' in length and width * Equipped with a minimum of 3500 lbs rated tandem axles * Delivery to 4200 BC-97, Summerland, BC V0H 1Z4 on or before March 31, 2023 **Contract Details** * Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD) * Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) * Regions of Delivery: British Columbia **Important Contact Information** Claudine Brown ( Procurement Specialist) TSA Canada SB Address: 220 South Wharf Boulevard, Surface 1230, Street Level, Ottawa, ON K1N 1C5 Phone: (613) 998-0650, ext. 426542 Fax: (613) 998-0619 Email: claudine.brown@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca URL: https://buyandsell.gc.ca/open-requests/tender-posting/-the-requrirements-rf026699 Attachments: None **Terms and Conditions** Please refer to the above-mentioned website for more details. This ITT will be cancelled on January 31, 2023 at 2:00 PM if no suppliers respond by then. Whoa! Look at that beautiful rewritten document in markdown format!
